Hyphens

# Hyphens

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support     |
| ---------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
hyphens-none
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
hyphens-manual
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
hyphens-auto
```   | 🌐 Web only |
